sys_ui_script.description: Add this file (or a copy) to JS Includes for a Service Portal Theme to enable and configure tabbed options for the theme.
sys_ui_script.name: TabbedConfigEnableV2
sys_ui_script.script: //Enable Tabbed Forms, Tabbed Catalog Items, Drag+Drop, Modal Forms, etc var gblTabbedConfig = { enableForm: true, // Show tabbed forms enableCatalog: true, // Show tabbed catalog items enableInlineEdit: true, // Allow inline editing on lists enableCatAttachDrop: true, // Allow attachment drag-and-drop for catalog items enableFormAttachDrop: true, // Allow attachment drag-and-drop for forms enableModals: true, // Allow modal popup forms enableFluidCtrs: true, // Changes "container" classes to "container-fluid" for full width pages enableCreateRef: true, // Plus (+) icon next to reference fields to add a new record (requires enableForm & prefers enableModals) enableReroute: true, // Reroutes OOB form and list pages to tabbed versions showHeader: true, // Show/hide page header showFooter: true // Show/hide page footer };
